sentences.sentence: The nation was led astray by a mountebank.
sentences.translation: 这个国家被一个夸夸其谈的骗子引入歧途。

sentences.sentence: I feared the woman had no better thought than to make a mountebank of her child!
sentences.translation: 我本来担心这女人除去拿她的孩子装幌子再也没有更好的想法呢！

sentences.sentence: I remember. there was an impudent mountebank who sold pills which as he told the country people were very good against an earthquake Joseph Addison.
sentences.translation: 我记得…有一个厚颜无耻的商人来推销能(据他对村民们所说的)对付地震极为有效的药片(约瑟夫·艾迪生)。
